COMMANDS EXECUTED
================================================================================
1. npm run build (gateway/cli-runner) - Build CLI to dist/
2. node dist/cli/runner.js analyze <file> --output json - JSON analysis
3. node dist/cli/runner.js analyze <file> --output md - Markdown analysis

CHAPTER 11 — FRENCH LANGUAGE SUPPORT
================================================================================

COMMAND EXECUTED:
npm run omega -- analyze "nexus/user_imputs/test.txt" --lang fr --output both --save "nexus/proof/chapter10/roman_analysis_fr"

FRENCH ANALYSIS RESULTS:
- Words: 83,121
- Keywords detected: 1,844
- Dominant emotion: trust
- Overall intensity: 27.7% (TARGET: >5% — ACHIEVED)

EMOTION BREAKDOWN:
| Emotion      | Intensity | Confidence |
|--------------|-----------|------------|
| trust        | 94.7%     | 42.7%      |
| joy          | 29.2%     | 13.2%      |
| fear         | 24.8%     | 11.2%      |
| sadness      | 24.7%     | 11.1%      |
| anger        | 24.4%     | 11.0%      |
| anticipation | 17.0%     | 7.6%       |
| surprise     | 5.5%      | 2.5%       |
| disgust      | 1.6%      | 0.7%       |

- fr.ts — French emotion keywords (with accent normalization)
